Thread: Specialised knowledge of a broad area
Specialised knowledge across a variety of areas

Descriptor Text:
Broad current general knowledge and an integrated body of specialised knowledge required to support a craft or an occupational discipline and knowledge of the connections with related disciplines;
Specialised knowledge here involves significant underpinning theory and an awareness of the boundaries of that knowledge

Thread: Detailed knowledge and understanding in one or more specialised areas, some of it at the current boundaries of the field(s)
Descriptor Text: Broad and up-to-date general knowledge and specialised knowledge of a variety of areas comprising a professional discipline and of the connections between these areas and with related disciplines

Thread: Demonstrate mastery of a complex and specialised area of skills and tools; use and modify advanced skills and tools to conduct closely guided research, professional or advanced technical activity
Descriptor Text: Broad and up-to-date general knowledge and specialised knowledge of a variety of areas comprising a professional discipline and of the connections between these areas and with related disciplines; to include knowledge about recent developments and trends in the professional discipline or its practice

Thread: Exercise appropriate judgement in a number of complex planning, design, technical and/ or management functions related to products, services, operations or processes, including resourcing

Thread: Use advanced skills to conduct research, or advanced technical or professional activity, accepting accountability for all related decision making; transfer and apply diagnostic and creative skills in a range of contexts

Thread: Act effectively under guidance in a peer relationship with qualified practitioners; lead multiple, complex and heterogeneous groups
Descriptor Text: Practical understanding of facts, concepts, rules, regulations, abstract models, methods, materials, tools, devices, technologies; their development and limitations; and how they are applied in current occupational activity

Thread: Learn to act in variable and unfamiliar learning contexts; learn to manage learning tasks independently, professionally and ethically

Descriptor Text: Critical understanding of facts, concepts, rules, models,  schools of thought, methods, technology; their development and limitations; and how they arise and are applied in current professional practice

Thread: An understanding of the theory, concepts and methods pertaining to a field (or fields) of learning
Descriptor Text: Comprehensive and critical evaluation of current developments and trends in the relevant professional or academic literature and as the basis for research or innovation and strategic change and leadership

Thread: Detailed knowledge and understanding in one or more specialised areas, some of it at the current boundaries of the field
Descriptor Text:
Knowledge of the context for professional activity (familiarity with the community
of practice and with safety, employment, technological and regulatory perspectives) and awareness of disciplines likely to be encountered as a member of the community of practice

Thread: Demonstrate mastery of a complex and specialised area of skills and tools; use and modify advanced skills and tools to conduct closely guided research, professional or advanced technical activity
Descriptor Text:
Knowledge of the context for professional activity (familiarity with the community

Thread: Exercise appropriate judgement in a number of complex planning, design, technical and/ or management functions related to products, services, operations or processes, including resourcing
Descriptor Text: Knowledge of the context for professional practice (including regulatory, economic, scientific, technological, social and cultural aspects) and awareness of other disciplines likely to be encountered as a practitioner and member of the profession

Thread: Use advanced skills to conduct research, or advanced technical or professional activity, accepting accountability for all related decision making; transfer and apply diagnostic and creative skills in a range of contexts
Descriptor Text: Knowledge of the context for professional practice (including regulatory, economic, scientific, technological, social and cultural aspects) and of significant issues at the interfaces with related disciplines and professions

Thread: Act effectively under guidance in a peer relationship with qualified practitioners; lead multiple, complex and heterogeneous groups
Descriptor Text:
Knowledge of the wider context for practice in the profession including critical awareness

Thread: Learn to act in variable and unfamiliar learning contexts; learn to manage learning tasks independently, professionally and ethically
Descriptor Text: Select from a broad range of specialised skills and tools and apply them to problems arising in professional activity; problems here are usually predictable but are subject to change

Thread: Express a comprehensive, internalised, personal world view manifesting solidarity with others
Descriptor Text: Select from a comprehensive range of specialised skills and tools and apply them to the generation of creative solutions to problems arising in professional activity

Thread: A systematic understanding of knowledge at, or informed by, the forefront of a field of learning
Descriptor Text: Select and apply advanced skills to analyse and respond to unpredictable and complex problems arising in the profession and its reflective practice.

Thread: A critical awareness of current problems and/or new insights, generally informed by the forefront of a field of learning
Descriptor Text: Select, modify and apply advanced skills to critically analyse, research (under close guidance)  and formulate responses to unpredictable, complex and  ill-defined problems arising in  the profession and its reflective professional practice

Thread: Demonstrate a range of standard and specialised research or equivalent tools and techniques of enquiry
Descriptor Text: Select, modify and apply advanced skills, including research or innovation skills,  to critically analyse, research independently and formulate responses to unpredictable, complex and ill-defined problems with many interacting factors, in order to develop new knowledge or procedures and integrate knowledge from other disciplines

Thread: Select from complex and advanced skills across a field of learning; develop new skills to a high level, including novel and emerging techniques
Descriptor Text: Evaluate and use information to draw conclusions and determine solutions to predictable problems arising in professional activity that take due account of social, field-specific and ethical insights

Thread: Act in a wide and often unpredictable variety of professional levels and ill defined contexts
Descriptor Text: Plan and develop investigative strategies and evaluate information to determine creative, evidence-informed solutions to predictable and unpredictable  problems and respond to unpredictable change arising in professional activity that take due account of social, field-specific and ethical insights

Thread: Take significant responsibility for the work of individuals and groups; lead and initiate activity
Descriptor Text: Prepare evidence-based conclusions that take due account of social, disciplinary and ethical insights

Thread: Scrutinise and reflect on social norms and relationships and act to change them

Thread: A systematic understanding of knowledge, at, or informed by, the forefront of a field of learning
Descriptor Text: Communicate oral and written information effectively in familiar contexts; engage in the transfer of knowledge and skills within the professional community of practice; convey information and decisions, to specialists and non-specialists, including clients
